name: re:(Cursed)
description:
Made for the Rowan ACM 2023 Game Jam, the theme was "Recursion".

It's a small game, but it was still a learning experience, and fun to make. Hopefully some people get some enjoyment out of it, especially my friends who I specifically put little jokes in for. 

PS: I was too tired to figure out why the pause menu doesn't work at the end, so you'll have to manually close it. Sorry!
